text: (Simon) Ertuğrul Bey, Candar Bey, olanları işittim.

I want you to know that I will do everything in my power.
All my men are at your command. Thank

text: Gerekirse arama için Karacahisar tekfurundan ricacı olurum.
english: If necessary, I will request a search from the governor of Karacahisar.

text: Ne kadar kalabalık olursak hatunları bulmamız o kadar kolaylaşır.
english: The larger the group, the easier it will be to find women.
...will handle our own affairs, Mr. Simon.
Why did you come here, Turgut?
I wanted to say get well soon.

text: Var git yoluna Turgut, sana diyecek sözüm yoktur.
english: Go on your way, Turgut, I have nothing more to say to you.

text: Eğer bize bunu edenlerin peşine düşüp hesabını göreydin...
english: If only you had gone after those who did this to us and held them accountable...
I know your pain is great, Ertuğrul Bey. I feel sorry for both

text: Halime Sultan'a da Gündüz'e de içim yanar.

english: you are the reason for all of this.
(Music - Thriller) Don't you ever come back, Obama,

text: Sakın bir daha obama gelmeyesin Turgut.

english: You were my husband all these years.
I'm not going to ask about this.
I'm used to betrayal, Simon. We have
I'm leaving. Keep your eyes wide open.
need to get out of here.
You're right, Aslıhan. We will escape.

text: İpler sıkıdır, kurtulmak istiyorsak onları gevşetmemiz gerekir.
english: The ropes are tight; if we want to escape, we need to loosen them. Push
If I found food, I ate it.
If I couldn't find it, I went hungry.
You weren't in any of them.
n't this what it means to be a lover? Was
n't it about being together in times of trouble... ...and times of joy?
I said he died on the battlefield. I
I said he forgot about me.
(Banı Çiçek) You've become a secret, Doğan.
(Bani Cicek) You left me all alone.
I fought on the battlefields too.
(Dogan) The sky is my blanket. I'm
I was scorched by the (rising) sun. I was very hungry.
But here I am, my flower.
You'll leave again when your wound heals.

text: (Banı Çiçek) Gene bir başıma koyacaksın beni.
english: (Bani Cicek) You're going to leave me all alone again. Oh

text: De hele Doğan'ım. Bu nasıl bir vazifedir böyle?
english: dear, Doğan. What kind of job is this?
My tongue is tied, Çiçek Hatun.
I can't say anything to anyone other than my husband.
my wound will not heal until I am reunited with you.
The birds are in a cage.
...what prey are you after this time?
So you used Amanda as a pawn.
(Amanda) You're not finished yet, Francisco. When

text: Ertuğrul Bey fidyeyi getirdiğinde hepsini öldüreceksin.
english: Ertuğrul Bey brings the ransom, you will kill them all.
Then you'll forget about it. Did
you think I was a fool?

text: Söyle, kim var bu işin ardında?
english: Tell me, who is behind this? Would I undertake such

text: Böyle büyük bir işi bu kadar altına yapar mıyım?
english: a huge project for so little money ?
Speak up or I'll kill you.
Candar Bey's son is Ural Bey. The

text: Ural Bey'ine söyle bunun iki katı altın isterim.
english: Tell Mr. Ural I want twice as much gold.
Otherwise, I'll cut off his head too. We
need to find out what they talked about.
...you are the one who gives and takes. Don't
Lord, do not test me with the pain of losing a child.

text: Ben yokken oba sana emanettir kardeşim.
english: your care while I'm away, brother.

text: -(Ertuğrul) Eğer bana bir şey olursa... -(Dündar) Abi!
english: -(Ertuğrul) If something happens to me... -(Dündar) Brother!

text: Sana bir şey olursa biz ne ederiz?
english: What will we do if something happens to you?

text: Ne pahasına olursa olsun obasını korur.
english: He will protect his tribe at all costs.
...he would be proud of you. Okay, let's

text: Tam işlerimizi yoluna koymuşken başımıza gelen bu melanet...
english: Just when we had everything sorted, this calamity befell us...

text: Ağır bir imtihandan geçmekteyiz Ertuğrul Bey.
english: We are going through a severe test, Ertuğrul Bey. A

text: Ağrısız baş, mezarda gerek Candar Bey.
english: headache-free head is only for the grave, Candar Bey.
We need to find another solution. You must have something in mind,

text: Mutlaka bir düşündüğün vardır Ertuğrul Bey'im.
Lakin ne düşündüysen bizi de katasın.
english: But whatever you're thinking, include us too.

text: Bu gözü dönmüş soysuz altın için her şeyi yapar Aliyar Bey.
english: This ruthless scoundrel will do anything for gold, Aliyar Bey.
He wanted me to come alone.
Otherwise, we cannot save our women.

text: Sen nasıl olsa nerede olduklarını bilirsin beyim.
english: You'll know where they are, sir. Let

text: Biz önden gidip gizlenelim. Bizi göremezler.
english: 's go ahead and hide. They can't see us.
I found them on the Akkozak road.
I don't know their original locations.

text: Ben oraya gitmeden mutlaka her yere adam yerleştireceklerdir.
english: They'll definitely place men everywhere before I even get there. If only we knew
where he was keeping the women ... We can't just stand here doing nothing, sir

text: Ben yarın sabah erkenden pazara gideceğim.
english: I'm going to the market early tomorrow morning. I'll ask everyone

text: Bu soysuz kimdir, nereye gizlenmiştir herkese soracağım.
english: who this scoundrel is and where he's hiding .

text: ...kızım için canını ortaya koydun Ertuğrul Bey.
english: ...for my daughter, you risked your life, Ertuğrul Bey.
I will never forget this kindness.
I brought the gold, my lord.
Why is Ural not included in the music?
What is he doing in Konya? We won't have peace of mind until we

text: Bu soruların cevabını öğrenmeden bize rahat yok Dündar.
english: know the answers to these questions, Dündar.
Thank God you cheated death. Get well soon

text: Geçmiş olsun kardeş, Allah şifa versin.
english: brother, may God grant you a speedy recovery.
How is your wound, Brother Samsa?
My wound is fine, brother, but...
...it saddens me that I can't finish the task.
Why do you let your widow hang down like that?

text: Bizim vazifeyi yarım bıraktığımız nerede görülmüştür?
english: Where has it ever been seen that we leave a task unfinished?

text: Tek derdimiz o değil ki Bamsı kardeş.
english: That's not our only problem, Bamsi brother. While

text: Halime Sultan'la Aslıhan Hatun eşkıyanın eline düşmüşken.
english: Halime Sultan and Aslıhan Hatun had fallen into the hands of bandits. I
understand you, brother, I understand. Now,

text: Hele hele beni bir dinleyin kardeşler.
Kardeşler, derler ki bir vakit Türk obalarına bir kaplan musallat olmuş.
english: The brothers say that once upon a time a tiger plagued the Turkish tribes.
There wasn't a herd he hadn't killed, or a warrior he hadn't defeated. While

text: Herkes ne edeceğiz, nasıl yapacağız derken vaziyet Han'a kadar gitmiş.
english: everyone was wondering what to do and how to do it, the situation reached Han.

text: Obalarım bu kaplanın zulmü altındayken benim hanlığım nerede kaldı demiş.
english: my tribes are under the tyranny of this tiger, where is my kingdom?" he said.

text: En yakın adamıyla yirmi Alp'i göndermiş obaya.
english: He sent twenty Alps, along with his closest man, to the encampment.
His son came and said, "Father, send me

text: ...gönderesin ki sana yakışır bir evlat olduğumu tüm cihana ispat edeyim." demiş.
english: ... send me so that I may prove to the whole world that I am a son worthy of you." he said.
Brothers, the Khan's son was strong.
His father said, "Son, I know your blood is boiling...
...but this is not your time." he said.
The son bowed his head in resignation. While

text: Kardeşler, Han'ın adamıyla yirmi Alp'i kaplanı ararlarken...
english: the brothers were searching for the twenty Alpine tigers with the Khan's man...
...suddenly a roar was heard. Before they

text: Daha ne olduğunu anlayamadan kaplan yirmi Alp'i de parçalayıvermiş.
english: could even understand what was happening, the tiger had torn all twenty Alpines to pieces.

text: Tam Han'ın adamı Alpleri gibi son nefesini verecekken...
english: Just as Han's man, like a warrior in the Alps, was about to breathe his last...

text: ...birden ortaya Han'ın oğlu çıkıp kaplanı boynundan sıkıvermiş.
english: ...suddenly Han's son appeared and grabbed the tiger by the neck. The
...have perished in the arms of that valiant soldier. And

text: İşte kardeşler, o günden sonra bu yiğit ere, Tunga namını vermişler.
english: so, from that day forward, the brothers gave this brave warrior the name Tunga.

text: Bu atamız Alp Er Tunga'nın hikâyesidir.
english: This is the story of our ancestor, Alp Er Tunga.
Brothers and sisters, a wolf cub will become a wolf.

text: Beyimiz de atası Alp Er Tunga gibi tek başına cihana bedeldir.
english: Our leader, like his ancestor Alp Er Tunga, is worth the whole world all by himself .

text: Kardeşler, devran dönse de, yıllar geçse de...
english: Brothers and sisters, even though times change and years pass...
...our blood, brothers and sisters, is the same blood.
The lineage, the siblings, they are of the same ancestry.

text: Bizde ne destan biter kardeşler, ne de er.
english: Brothers, neither the epics nor the heroes will ever end for us.

text: Şimdi destan yazma vakti Ertuğrul Bey'imizdedir.
english: Now it is Ertuğrul Bey's time to write an epic. May
God grant victory to our Ertuğrul Bey .

text: Ona, ona ve biz Alplerine nice fetihler ihsan eylesin.
english: him, him and us, many victories in the Alps .

text: Kardeşler, kardeşler, gün gelsin, birileri de...
english: Brothers, brothers, may the day come when someone...
...will tell the epic of our Ertuğrul Bey.
Ertuğrul is a very dangerous person. He's
As I said, he'll come alone tomorrow.

text: Sen yanına dört tane adam al, Akkozak'ta Ertuğrul'u bekle.
english: Take four men with you and wait for Ertuğrul in Akkozak.
(Francisco) Let the others lie in wait.
If he doesn't come alone, kill them all.
Both the enemies within and those outside...

text: ...bize bir damla huzuru çok gördüler Aslıhan Hatun.
english: ...they begrudged us even a drop of peace, Aslıhan Hatun.

text: Ertuğrul Bey'ime yüklü olduğumu söylediğim gün dün gibi aklımdadır.
english: I remember the day I told Ertuğrul Bey that I was pregnant as if it were yesterday.
I'm burdened, Ertuğrul. We're going to have

text: Üstte mavi gök, altta yağız yel, şahidim ol, baba oluyorum baba!
english: Above the blue sky, below the dark wind, bear witness, I am becoming a father!
How can I stay calm, my doe-eyed love?

text: Bütün otağımız bu haber için yanar tutuşurdu.
english: Our entire tent was filled with anticipation for this news .
Gündüz will get a brother, sir.
God willing, we will have another child.
They say that only fate protects a person from death.

text: Allah nasip ederse Gündüz'e tekrar kavuşacaksın.
english: God willing, you will be reunited with Gündüz.
We couldn't hear what they were talking about inside.

text: Ama bu işi birlikte hallettikleri gün gibi ortada.
english: But it's crystal clear that they accomplished this together .

text: Bu işin arkasından da Ural çıktı.
english: Ural was behind this as well.

text: Demek Ural bizden haber almak için Amanda'yı kullanırdı.
english: So Ural used Amanda to get information about us.
I'll make that woman pay for this. The
amount of blood that will be shed will be immeasurable.

text: Ertuğrul olanları öğrendiğinde Ural'ı öldürmek için her şeyi yapacaktır.
english: When Ertuğrul learns what happened, he will do everything to kill Ural. He will not let the
murderer of his wife and son live .

text: Candar da buna asla izin vermeyecektir.
english: Candar would never allow that either. Once

text: Amanda'yı Ertuğrul Bey'e verdiğimizde gerisi çorap söküğü gibi gelecektir.
english: we give Amanda to Ertuğrul Bey, everything else will fall into place . What
if Amanda doesn't tell Ertuğrul what she knows?

text: Biz de gereğini yaparız. Öyle değil mi Maria?
english: We will do what is necessary. Isn't that right, Maria?

text: Onu bülbül gibi öttürmeyi bilirim Üstat Simon.
english: I know how to make it sing like a nightingale, Master Simon.
Petrus, keep an eye on Amanda's counter.

text: Ural ne olup bittiğini öğrenmek için mutlaka oraya gidecektir.
english: Ural will definitely go there to find out what's going on.
I saw it with my own eyes today.
I will use it in inter-tribal warfare. Don't push it

text: Sakın üstüne gitme. Beni anladın mı?
Allah'ım, sen beyimi, obamı, tüm sevdiklerimizi koru.
english: God, protect my husband, my tribe, and all our loved ones. Please
spare Gündüz for us. May God grant that

text: Halime Sultan'ın sağ salim kurtulmasını nasip eyle.
english: Halime Sultan be rescued safely . O
Lord, do not test us with those we love.
(Sound of door opening) (Sound of door creaking)
(Sound of door creaking) (Sound of door closing)

text: Allah'ım, Alplerimin ruhlarını şad, mekanlarını cennet eyle.
english: O God, grant peace to the souls of my Alps and make their resting place in Paradise. Grant

text: Bana da Alplerimin canına kıyan hainlerden intikamımı almayı nasip eyle.
english: me the grace to take revenge on the traitors who harmed my Alps.

text: Onların kanının hesabını sormadan son nefesimi verdirme rabbim.
english: Lord, do not let me breathe my last breath without avenging their blood.
Even though our worship practices are different...

text: Dilerim Tanrı bütün dualarını kabul eder.
english: I hope God answers all your prayers. Thank you,

text: Tez dualarımın kabul olacağı günü beklerim.
english: I eagerly await the day my prayers will be answered. My

text: Hayattaki tek gayem bir an önce intikamımı alıp...
english: only goal in life is to get my revenge as soon as possible and...
...be able to breathe in peace again.

text: Ben de o günü senin kadar heyecanla beklerim.
english: I look forward to that day with as much excitement as you do.
(Maria) The day your pain ends and you become happy...
...that's the day I'll be happy too.

text: Vuslatınız, daha iyi günde olaydı keşke.
english: I wish your reunion had taken place on a better day.
... will be the day our tribe finds peace and safety, brother. You're

text: Obamızın yüzü gülmez iken bize gülmek haramdır.
english: It is forbidden for us to smile while our community is unhappy.

text: Doğan Alp'imin başına bir hal geldi korkusuyla...
english: Out of fear that something bad had happened to my son Doğan Alp...
I uttered words that were unbecoming of both me and my husband. Please

text: Baskın yerinde yaptığın fedakarlık için sağ olasın.
english: for your sacrifice at the raid site.
...Karacahisar Castle is now complete, thank God.
I drew every single inch of it. I know

text: Kalenin kaç girişi vardır, kaç çıkışı vardır...
english: how many entrances and exits the castle has...
...where the guards are stationed, I know it all. They are all

text: Hepsi hem heybemdedir, hem de aklımdadır.
english: in my bag, and they are all in my mind.

text: Bunca zaman bizim için casusluk edip...
english: spying for us all this time...

text: Bu bilgiler fetihte bize ışık olacak Doğan'ım.
english: This information will guide us in the conquest, Doğan.
There is a time for everything. I

text: Keşke biz de seninle geleydik beyim.
english: wish we could have come with you, sir. Oh

text: He ya beyim, yalnız gitmene gönlümüz el vermez.
english: sir, we can't bear the thought of you going alone.
God is with us, brothers and sisters. Please forgive me
I wanted to talk to you inside because I didn't want anyone to see me. Are

text: Dediğin gibi Aslıhan'ı da, Halime'yi de kaçırmış.
english: As you said, he kidnapped both Aslıhan and Halime.
He also told Ertuğrul Bey what he wanted. "
If you don't come with a thousand gold coins
... I'll kill both of them," he said.

text: Ertuğrul'un bin altını olmadığına göre ya Alpleriyle vuruşmaya gidecek...
english: Since Ertuğrul doesn't have a thousand gold coins, he will either go to fight his Alps...

text: ...ya da babam ona bin altını verecek.
english: ...or my father will give him a thousand gold coins.

text: Öyle ya da böyle Francisco'nun tuzağına düşecek.
english: One way or another, he'll fall into Francisco's trap.

text: Francisco'nun adamları Haçlı Ordu'sunda savaşmış güçlü savaşçılar.
english: Francisco's men are powerful warriors who fought in the Crusader Army.
Ertuğrul's body will be found there.
But we have a problem, sir.

text: Bir eşkıyadan başka ne beklenirdi ki?
english: What else could you expect from an outlaw?

text: Yalnız bana bak, bu işin ardında olduğumu öğrenirse gırtlağını keserim.
english: Just look at me, if he finds out I'm behind this, I'll slit his throat. Don't worry, sir,
So why are you still worried? I will rescue
I'll tell you about that later.
Let's catch up a little first.
I'd like to stay with you tonight.

text: Yarabbi, gönlümü dağlayan bu dertten sana sığındım.
english: O Lord, I seek refuge in You from this sorrow that tears at my heart.

text: Acımı çoğaltan bu fitneden sana sığındım.
english: I seek refuge in You from this affliction that intensifies my suffering.

text: Ey zorluklarla birlikte kolaylıklar da veren Allah'ım.
english: O God, who grants ease along with hardship!

text: Helalimi zalimin zulmünden kurtarmama yardım et.
english: Help me to rescue my lawful spouse from the tyranny of the oppressor. Help me send those who

text: Ona bunu yapanları, cehennemine yollamama yardım et.
english: did this to her to hell . Grant
sole owner of my heart. How can I sleep on this bed while
you are in the hands of a tyrant
While you wait for me with teary eyes...
...how can I possibly fit in here?
...if you turn your beautiful wool to the dark skies...
Without you, my dwelling is a dungeon...

text: Tüm alem-i cihan dar gelir bana.
english: whole world feels too small for me.

text: Soysuzların cirit attığı bir devirde ateşin içine doğdun.
english: You were born into the fire in an era where scoundrels ran rampant.
The tyrants will not leave him alone.

text: Lakin asla baş eğmeyecek, kimsenin karşısında diz çökmeyeceksin.
english: But you will never bow down, you will never kneel before anyone.
We are Turks, son. We are the
valiant warriors of the steppe. For us, there is no

text: Rahman ve rahim olan Allah'ın adıyla.
english: In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful. She didn't
open her heart to you. Didn't we take
that burden off your shoulders? That burden on

text: ...ve bu şekilde sana eziyet veren bu yükünü.
Demek ki zorlukla beraber bir kolaylık var.
english: So, it seems that with difficulty comes ease.

text: Evet, o zorlukla beraber bir kolaylık var.
english: Yes, with that difficulty comes an ease.

text: O halde boş kaldığında yine kalk, yorul...
english: So when you are free, rise again, exert yourself...

text: Rahman ve rahim olan Allah'ın adıyla.
english: In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

text: Doğrusu biz sana apaçık bir fetih ihsan ettik.
english: Indeed, We have granted you a clear victory.

text: Böylece Allah senin geçmiş ve gelecek günahlarını bağışlar.
english: Thus, God will forgive your past and future sins.

text: Sana olan nimetini tamamlar ve seni doğru yola iletir.
english: He completes His favor upon you and guides you to the straight path.

text: Ve sana Allah, şanlı bir zaferle yardım eder.
english: And God will grant you a glorious victory. It is He who sends down tranquility
into the hearts of the believers, so that their faith may increase.
The armies of the heavens and the earth belong to Allah.
God knows best. He is the one who
does everything with wisdom. That He may admit
believing men and believing women into gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein
they will abide eternally, and that He may

text: İşte bu Allah katında büyük bir kurtuluştur...
english: This is a great salvation in the sight of Allah...

text: ...ve o Allah hakkında kötü zanda bulunan...
english: ...and it is so that He may punish the hypocrite men and women who harbor evil thoughts about Allah... ...

text: ...ve ortak koşan kadınlara azap etmesi içindir.
english: and the men and women who associate partners with Allah .
Bad things have happened to them.
God has become angry with them...
...cursed them and prepared Hell for them.
What a terrible place that is.
The armies of the heavens and the earth belong to Allah.
God is all-powerful. He is the
Undoubtedly, Allah is the one who speaks the truth.
Surely Allah is the one who speaks the truth.
God not withhold healing from you.

text: Anan gelene dek iyi olacaksın inşallah Gündüz'üm.
english: Hopefully you'll be alright by the time your mother arrives, Gündüz.
God protect you from the evil eye...
Hopefully, things will go smoothly, like water flowing back and forth.
(Sound of metal coins) Thanks to the

text: Kayının ve Çavdarların kudretli hatunları sayesinde...
english: powerful women of Kayın and Çavdar ...

text: ...bugün bu altınlara bin altın daha eklenecek.
english: ...today a thousand more gold coins will be added to these gold coins.

text: Sen o altınları kullanabileceğini mi sanırsın?
english: you think you can use that gold?

text: ...bir tekine bile dokunamadan bu cihandan göçüp gittiler.
english: ...and yet they passed away from this world without ever touching a single drop . You will choke to death with

text: Francisco, Ertuğrul Bey'in getirdiği altınlarla kral gibi yaşayacak.
english: Francisco will live like a king with the gold that Ertuğrul Bey brought.

text: Sen gerçekten Ertuğrul Bey'in elinden sağ kurtulabileceğine inanır mısın?
english: you really believe you could survive Ertuğrul Bey's attack ? I'm sure I'll

text: Çünkü bilirim ki ölüler dirilere hiçbir şey yapamaz.
english: Because I know that the dead can do nothing to the living.

text: Ertuğrul sağ çıkamayacağı bir tuzağın ortasına gelmekte.
english: Ertuğrul is about to fall into a trap from which he cannot escape.

text: ...sizi ve onu buradan sağ salim göndereceğime inanmakta.
english: ... he believes I will send you and him away from here safe and sound.
...die while looking each other in the eye .
(Ertuğrul's voiceover) I swear by my God, by my banner...

text: (Ertuğrul dış ses) Vazife verilenlerden olduğum için hamdolsun.
english: (Ertuğrul's voiceover) I am grateful to be among those who have been given this task.

text: (Ertuğrul dış ses) Atam Oğuz'un şanlı nesli için çıktığım bu yoldan dönersem...
english: (Ertuğrul's voiceover) If I turn back from this path I have taken for the glorious lineage of my ancestor Oğuz...

text: ...kara çelik öz kılıcımla gök ekini gibi biçileyim.
english: ... may I be cut down like a crop from the sky with my black steel sword.

text: (Ertuğrul dış ses) Mavi gök yarılsın, yağız yer delinsin.
english: (Ertuğrul's voiceover) Let the blue sky split open, let the dark earth crack open.

text: (Ertuğrul dış ses) Oğuz babam, kutlu obam ahrette benden davacı olsun.
english: (Ertuğrul's voiceover) May my father Oğuz, my blessed tribe, be my accuser in the afterlife.
(Ertuğrul's voiceover) On this holy path I've embarked upon...

text: ...Hızır Ata yoldaşım, Hazreti Ali pirim olsun.
english: ...May Hızır Ata be my companion, and حضرت Ali my spiritual guide.

text: (Ertuğrul dış ses) Sefer bizim, zafer Allah'ın olsun!
english: (Ertuğrul's voiceover) The campaign is ours, may the victory be God's!

text: Beyim, emrettiğin gibi bütün pazarı soruşturdum.
english: Sir, as you ordered, I inquired throughout the entire market.

text: Lakin at izi it izine karışmış beyim.
english: But sir, things have gotten very mixed up.
You go back to the village, Kutluca. Yes sir, your wish is my command

text: (Aliyar dış ses) Allah'ım Hazreti Ali'nin duasıyla sana sesleniyorum.
english: (Aliyar's voiceover) O God, I call upon you with the prayer of Hazrat Ali.

text: (Aliyar dış ses) Hakikatte sen herkese galip gelen, kötüleri kahreden...
english: (Aliyar's voiceover) In truth, you are the one who triumphs over all, who crushes the wicked...

text: (Aliyar dış ses) Bu belayı başımızdan def eyle yarabbi.
english: (Aliyar's voiceover) Oh Lord, remove this calamity from us.
I pray to our saints for their salvation.

text: İki obanın onca acısına rağmen kadınların yine de çalışmaya geldiğini gördüm.
english: Despite all the suffering in those two villages, I saw that the women still came to work.

text: Ertuğrul Bey gördüğüm en dirayetli adam.
english: Ertuğrul Bey is the most resolute man I've ever met. He

text: Pazara geldiği ilk gün anlamıştım bunu.
english: I knew it the day he arrived at the market.
need to tell you what I know.
What are you talking about, woman?
I think I know who kidnapped them.
He rarely comes to the market because...

text: (Aliyar) Hatunlarımızın kaçırılmasının bununla ne ilgisi var?
english: (Aliyar) What does the kidnapping of our women have to do with this?
The day the carpet workshop opened...

text: Halime'yle Aslıhan Hatun hakkında sorular sordu.
english: He asked questions about Halime and Aslıhan Hatun.

text: Sonra korktum ve tezgâhıma geri döndüm.
english: Then I got scared and went back to my stall.

text: Yanındaki haydutlardan biri dükkânıma gelir gider.
english: One of the thugs who works with him comes and goes from my shop.

text: Aya Nikolas Kayalıklarını mesken tuttuklarını işittim.
english: I heard they made the rocks of Saint Nicholas their home.

text: Yalnız beyim, bunları benim söylediğimi kimse işitmesin olur mu?
english: But sir, please don't let anyone hear me say these things, okay?
What's wrong, Aliyar? What's all this fuss? The women who

text: Pazara çalışmaya gelen hatunları eşkıya basmış abi.
english: came to work at the market were attacked by bandits, man.

text: Aslıhan bacımla Halime Sultan'ı kaçırmışlar ama yerlerini öğrendim.
english: My sister Aslıhan and Halime Sultan were kidnapped, but I found out where they are. We

text: Ertuğrul fidye verip hatunları kurtarmak için...
english: Ertuğrul went alone to their lair to pay the ransom and rescue the women. Then let's

text: O vakit Batuhan'a haber verelim, Alpleri hazırlasın.
english: inform Batuhan to prepare the Alps. There's
no time, man, no time. Then let's

text: (İbn-i Arabi dış ses) Düşmanın gözlerine bakıp vakti gelene kadar...
english: (Ibn-i Arabi's voiceover) The skill lies in looking the enemy in the eye and not drawing that weapon from its sheath until the time is right...

text: Düşmanın da alt edilmesinin bir vakti vardır elbet.
english: There is a time when even the enemy can be defeated.

text: Düşmandır seni yiğit eyleyen, aslan eyleyen.
english: It is the enemy that makes you brave , that makes you a lion.
If I said I'll come, I'll come. Gold

text: Önce Halime Sultan'la Aslıhan Hatun'u serbest bırak.
english: First, release Halime Sultan and Aslıhan Hatun.
wants you to be together, not to separate.

text: Ama bu dünyada, ama öbür dünyada.
english: But whether in this world or the next.
(Halime) I told you that your death would be at my hands.

text: (Halime) Oğlumun, oğlumun canına kıydığın altınlara doy!
english: (Halime) May you be satiated with the gold you bought to take my son's life!

text: Seni görünce daha da iyi olacak.
english: will be even better when I see you. Thank
Ertuğrul, let's go to our camp, let's go immediately.
for having two brave older brothers... Get well soon,
God be pleased with you. We would have been in a
bad situation if you had been late. May
God preserve our unity so that...
...no trouble or hardship befalls our tribes, my lord.

text: Böyle yiğit bir Alp'le buluşmak gibisi yok.
english: nothing like meeting such a valiant warrior.
I've never smelled anything like it in my life.
(Amanda) Turgut will love this scent too.
Your cheeks are all rosy. You seemed to have

text: Dün gece birine açılmış bir halin var.
english: opened up to someone last night. There's nothing to be ashamed of,

text: Bu koku Turgut'u kaplan, seni de bir cennet güzeline çevirecek.
english: This scent will turn Turgut into a tiger, and you into a heavenly beauty.
Your scent came out too, Amanda.
We can start the war now.
Thank goodness, Ertuğrul Bey is coming.
Ertuğrul Bey is coming, thank God.

text: (Hep bir ağızdan) Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa.
(Hep bir ağızdan) Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa.
(Hep bir ağızdan) Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa.
(Hep bir ağızdan) Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa.
(Hep bir ağızdan) Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa.
(Hep bir ağızdan) Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa.
(Hep bir ağızdan) Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa.
(Hep bir ağızdan) Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa.
(Hep bir ağızdan) Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa.
(Hep bir ağızdan) Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa.
(Hep bir ağızdan) Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa.
(Hep bir ağızdan) Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa.
(Hep bir ağızdan) Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa.
(Hep bir ağızdan) Ertuğrul Bey'im çok yaşa.

english: Mr. Artuk, how is my son doing?
During the day, I can't stand it, don't do it, son.
My child, please don't, please don't.
(Halime) Open your eyes, please, I beg you, open them.
I owe my son to you, Ertuğrul Bey. May

text: Aliyar Bey ve Ural Bey olmasaydı...
english: If it weren't for Aliyar Bey and Ural Bey...
...I couldn't have brought them back safe and sound.
(Aliyar) We taught those bandits a lesson.
Your children are just like you always wanted, Dad.

text: Tek yürek, tek yumruk olmayı bildi.
english: They knew how to be united, as one heart and one fist.
(Halime) My dear child, open your eyes.
(Halime) Don't do this to us, Gündüz, don't.

text: Ertuğrul, bir şey de bana kurbanın olayım.
english: Ertuğrul, please do something for me too, I beg you.

text: De ki Halime, Gündüz'e bir şey olamayacak.
english: Say to Halime, nothing will happen to Gündüz. Say

text: Oğlun yaşayacak de Ertuğrul, bir şey de.
english: something, Ertuğrul, say your son will live. Tell

text: Oğluna bir şey olmayacak de Ertuğrul.
english: Ertuğrul that nothing will happen to his son.
I can't do it, Ertuğrul. Say
(Halime) May your mother be sacrificed for you.

text: Bana ne vakit sahi kılıç yapacaksın?
english: When are you going to make me a real sword?
You scared me so much, son, during the day.
When the time comes. Thank you,
God you have blessed us with my grandchild. Thank

text: Yanında da elleri bağlı bir kadın.
english: Next to her is a woman with her hands tied.
He said he wanted to meet with you.
The man you met when you went to Konya...
But now is not the time.
Who did I say to you?

text: Bak baba, hâlâ bu işin içinde parmağım olduğunu düşünüyorsan...
english: Look, father, if you still think I had a hand in this...
...you can ask His Highness the Emir if I was with him or not.

text: Sana bizzat onun ağzından güzel haberler getirdim.
english: I brought you good news directly from him.

text: Allah izin verirse iyi olacaktır inşallah.
english: God willing, everything will be alright.

text: Abdurrahman, Simon'un elleri bağlı bir kadın getirdiğini söyledi.
english: Abdurrahman said Simon brought a woman with her hands tied. Let's
go and see what he wants.

text: Ben barıştan, huzurdan yanayım Ertuğrul Bey.
english: I am for peace and tranquility, Mr. Ertuğrul. I found out who was plotting against

text: Benim pazarıma, senin obana ve ailene kastedeni öğrendim.
english: my market, your village, and your family.

text: Ve işte onu sana teslim ediyorum.
english: And here I am, delivering it to you.

text: (Halime dış ses) İçimizdeki düşmanlar da, dışımızdakiler de...
english: (Halime's voiceover) Both the enemies within and those outside...
...begrudged us even a drop of peace.

text: (Halime dış ses) Oğlumun canına kıydın bilir misin sen?
english: (Halime's voiceover) Do you realize you took my son's life?

text: (Aliyar dış ses) Pazara çalışmaya gelen hatunları eşkıya basmış abi.
english: (Aliyar's voiceover) Bandits attacked the women who came to work at the market, brother.

text: İki oba arasındaki savaşı başlatmanın vakti geldi.
english: The time has come to start the war between the two tribes.

text: (Ertuğrul dış ses) Her kimse bunu yapan, bulup ciğerini sökeceğim!
english: (Ertuğrul's voiceover) Whoever did this, I'll find them and rip their guts out!
